description.narrative: (Pakistan): FY 2016 funds will continue to support the on-going Sindh Community Mobilization Program (CMP). The CMP works with communities for the effective management of schools in seven specific districts and five selected towns of Karachi. The project objectives include: 1) increase communities' involvement in the consolidation of schools; 2) improve community and district government coordination; 3) improve child nutrition in selected communities and schools; and 4) sustain community mobilization and school based management..
